item.title: How I hacked my first router
item.author: Author
item.description: How I Hacked My First Router I have never found a real vulnerability in the “real world” before. I was just playing CTFs and Wargames. One day I was looking through our old stuff, and I stumbled up on this router the ZTE - ZXDSL 831C II, and had heard before that this router has a vulnerability. So I thought this would be the perfect chance. I set it up and started pwning.
